column4: unrelated; i'm considering upgrading ubuntu from 8.04 to 10.04, yet when i tried to install from cd my monitor would go into standby. if i chose to use the text install, i shouldn't have a problem getting video when finished, right?
ofc you will have a problem
no, wait at least for 10.04 update 1
say that after days messing with broken packages, scripts and no sleep.
